page.title: 14GUITING POWER.POST OFFICE
page.content: Our Post Office is a shop as well.It sells toys,books,hats,pens, plasticene,cards,wool,toilet goods and kitchen items. The Post Office sells stamps,takes parcels,runs the Girobank and National Savings Bank and,if you wish,you can pay bills,eg.,for televisions, telephones and cars. The International Centre for Conservation Education sends parcels to many different countries. The postal van comes from the sorting-office at Andoversford.Mail is collected twice a day, but there is only one delivery. Many village post-offices are being closed.We have two in our area and we hope they stay open. Our teacher takes the dinner-money to the Post-Office.
